facebook.enable.title: Enable
facebook.enable.description: Check this box to enable the Facebook addThis sharing service.

facebook.appId.title: Application id
facebook.appId.description: Enter your custom application ID to associate the domain to your application ID.

facebook.popupOptions.status.title: Facebook popup status
facebook.popupOptions.status.description: Select yes to enable the Facebook popup. Select no to disable it.

facebook.popupOptions.resizable.title: Facebook popup resizable
facebook.popupOptions.resizable.description: Select yes to make the popup resizable. Select no to restrict resizing.

facebook.popupOptions.personalbar.title: Facebook popup personalbar
facebook.popupOptions.personalbar.description: Select yes to show a personal bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.directories.title: Facebook popup directories
facebook.popupOptions.directories.description: Select yes to show a directories bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.location.title: Facebook popup location
facebook.popupOptions.location.description: Select yes to show a location bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.toolbar.title: Facebook popup toolbar
facebook.popupOptions.toolbar.description: Select yes to show a tool bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.menubar.title: Facebook popup menubar
facebook.popupOptions.menubar.description: Select yes to show a menu bar on the popup menu. Select no to hide it.

facebook.popupOptions.width.title: Facebook popup width
facebook.popupOptions.width.description: Enter the width (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.

facebook.popupOptions.height.title: Facebook popup height
facebook.popupOptions.height.description: Enter the height (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.

facebook.popupOptions.left.title: Facebook popup left
facebook.popupOptions.left.description: Enter the left offset (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.

facebook.popupOptions.top.title: Facebook popup top
facebook.popupOptions.top.description: Enter the top offset (in pixels) of the Facebook popup.
